description: Updates a provisioning template. Requires permission to access the UpdateProvisioningTemplate action.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: The name of the provisioning template.

parameters.name: preProvisioningHook
parameters.description: Updates the pre-provisioning hook template. Only supports template of type FLEET_PROVISIONING. For more information about provisioning template types, see type. payloadVersion (string) --- The payload that was sent to the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported. The ARN of the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported.

nested_params.name: payloadVersion
nested_params.description: The payload that was sent to the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported.

nested_params.name: targetArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported.
